message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $115. I believe it's a great deal and worth considering.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit more reasonable. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $108?
